column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Guidingway has a request that only an adventurer such as yourself could fulfill.
Defeat a daphnia and obtain its remains.
Deliver the daphnia's remains to Guidingway.
Ah, there you are. Do you have a moment? While going over the resources sent by our collaborators, I stumbled upon a rather curious morsel of information that wants for verification.
Is it true that you procure crafting materials from other living creatures, and thereafter use them to craft <Emphasis>without</Emphasis> using creation magicks?
Incredible! I'd like to try my hand at it, but first I'll require materials to craft with...
Considering what resources are here in Mare Lamentorum, I thought a daphnia would be the perfect specimen to harvest material from, but I am hardly a hunter.
But that's where you come in! Being Hydaelyn's champion and all, I have no doubt you can handle a daphnia or two. Might I trouble you to bring one back for study?
Wonderful! The daphnias inhabit the area around Lovingway's Darlings, if you're looking for a place to start. Happy hunting!
You should have no trouble finding a daphnia near Lovingway's Darlings.
Welcome back. I take it you have a daphnia for me? Or what's left of one, I suppose.
Oh, goodness! Apologies, I've never seen one this close before.
Yes... As I thought, the skin is quite elastic.
With this, it should prove no trouble at all to produce clothing for people of all sizes!
What will you say?
Sounds quite comfortable!
Wouldn't clothes from that be a little too...translucent?
Are you sure clothes made from that are a good idea?
I had hoped you would approve! We'll make the finest garb for you and your kind.
Now that you mention it... We'll have to come up with a rigorous dye treatment to ensure the cloth isn't too revealing.
What's the matter? The resulting garments will be highly practical, not to mention comfortable.
In any case, you've been a great help. It's not much, but I'd like you to have this.
